dc:title: Archive of historical data on number of tests and positivity rate for COVID-19 in Germany
dc:creator: Dominic Wild
dc:subject: historical data on the testing volume for COVID-19 in EU
dc:description: columns: tests_done, positivity_rate, year, week, time tests_done: number of tests done within week positivity rate: 100 x number of new confirmed cases/number of tests done per week year: year of sample week: week of sample time: number derived from week and year, comparable
dc:contributor: European Centre for Disease Prevention and Control
